section.title: Into the Woods
section.p: Maurice gets lost on his way to a fair and ends up coming across the castle where the beast lives. The dad is made a prisoner until Belle finds him and exchanges her freedom for his, trading places.

section.title: Into the Woods
section.p: Maurice gets lost on his way to the fair to present his latest creation and ends up stumbling upon the castle of the beast. He is made a prisoner--that is, until Belle exchanges her freedom for his, becoming the prisoner herself.
